name: caf_hellosleepy
description: Cloud Assistants with React, power management with impersonation
author: Antonio Lain <antlai@cafjs.com>

scripts.build-min-js: export NODE_ENV=production; browserify public/js/main.js | uglifyjs > public/js/build.min.js
scripts.build-iot: cd iot;  if test -f all.tgz; then tar xvf all.tgz; fi; rm -f *.tgz; rm -f npm-shrinkwrap.json; npm install --production; npm shrinkwrap;  npm pack; cp *.tgz ../public/iot.tgz; rm -fr node_modules/*;
scripts.build-app: npm run build-js && npm run build-min-js
scripts.build: npm run build-app && npm run build-iot
